Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.internal_cs

Class DistributedCVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.internal_cs.DistributedCVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentVirtualMachineI, DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
    public class DistributedCVM
extends AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class DistributedCVM implements the multi-JVM assembly for the basic client/server example.

    Description

    An URI provider component defined by the class URIProvider offers an URI creation service, which is used by an URI consumer component defined by the class URIConsumer. The URI provider is deployed within a JVM running an instance of the CVM called provider in the config.xml file. The URI consumer is deployed in the instance called consumer.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2014-01-22

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
